subject: Soccer
Football Association Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Stoke, the world’s second-oldest professional soccer club, will play in its first F.A. Cup final in its 148 years after routing Bolton, 5-0.
snippet: Stoke, the world’s second-oldest professional soccer club, will play in its first F.A. Cup final in its 148 years after routing Bolton, 5-0.
